definition: many and complicated/mired in minor details
complicated/many/in great numbers/abbr. for 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3], traditional form of Chinese characters

sentences.english: Thirdly, loan losses and write-off criteria are too strict and cumbersome.
sentences.chinese: 貸款損失的認定和核銷標準過於嚴格和繁瑣。

sentences.english: Extracting and interpreting the seismic velocity spectrum data manually is kind of tedious work.
sentences.chinese: 人工整理地震速度譜資料是比較繁瑣的。

sentences.english: The design team was able to dispense with the time-consuming steps of welding on the seat and back rest.
sentences.chinese: 設計團隊省略生產時焊接研磨的繁瑣步驟與工時。

sentences.english: That is the most cockamamie plan I've ever heard. It will never work.
sentences.chinese: 這是我聽過的最繁瑣的計劃，它行不通。

sentences.english: Invoid of cumbersome procedure of getting out toothpaste, convenient for anybody.
sentences.chinese: 避免繁瑣的擠牙膏過程，適合大衆便於使用。

sentences.english: But the process is too cumbersome to hold governments to account.
sentences.chinese: 但是這一過程程序太過繁瑣，很難能讓政府報賬。

sentences.english: Cumbersome UAW work rules have only been tweaked.
sentences.chinese: 繁瑣的工會工作規則只能做調整。

sentences.english: The third solution can be wordy, but it has many advantages.
sentences.chinese: 第三種解決方案可能有點繁瑣，但是它有許多優點。

sentences.english: Hesse often created elaborate, handmade pieces involving obsessive repetition.
sentences.chinese: 黑塞往往造成繁瑣，重複的手工作品涉及迷戀。

sentences.english: This can be tedious to maintain because it imposes a duplication of code.
sentences.chinese: 這樣維護起來會非常繁瑣，因爲代碼是重複的。

sentences.english: Checking the versions of Dream of the Red Chamber is a demanding task.
sentences.chinese: 參校《紅樓夢》是一件相當繁瑣的事。

sentences.english: Simple space spurns the expensive and fussy characteristics of traditional design.
sentences.chinese: 簡約空間在設計上摒棄了傳統設計奢華與繁瑣的特點。

sentences.english: The complicated steps are changed into one step in the utility model;
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型是將繁瑣的步奏改成一步。
申請罷工的程序非常繁瑣。

sentences.english: Because of all red tape at immigration I missed my connecting flight.
sentences.chinese: 的繁瑣公事程序，我誤了聯程航班。

sentences.english: This shop uses too many colorful decorations, which makes it look kind of fussy.
sentences.chinese: 這家店用了太多彩飾，顯得色彩過多，有些繁瑣。

definition: to expend a great deal of effort
to handle/to treat/to deal with/to process/to deal with a criminal case/to mete out punishment/to offer for sale at a reduced price/to punish
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
inconvenient/troublesome/annoying/to trouble or bother sb/to put sb to trouble
